      • calculateCost

                                      JobType jobType)

      • calculateCost

        public java.lang.Double calculateCost(java.lang.Double cost)
        Description copied from class: Discount
        Calculates the Job's cost using the Discount subclass's details. For example, if the subclass is FixedDiscount, this method will subtract the fixed discount rate from the cost passed in.
        Specified by:
        calculateCost in class Discount
        Parameters:
        cost - the initial cost of the Job before the discount is applied.
        Returns:
        the final cost of the Job after the discount rate has been applied.
        See Also:
        FixedDiscount, FlexibleDiscount, VariableDiscount

      • rate

        public java.lang.Double rate(java.lang.Double cost,
                             JobType jobType)

      • rate

        public java.lang.Double rate(java.lang.Double cost)
        Description copied from class: Discount
        The discount rate that the discount provides. Different Discount subclasses provide varying rates depending on specific factors. This method returns the final rate.
        Specified by:
        rate in class Discount
        Parameters:
        cost - the initial cost of the Job before the discount is applied.
        Returns:
        the discount rate in percentage that the Discount provides.
        See Also:
        FixedDiscount, FlexibleDiscount, VariableDiscount
